text: Jin logon ne kufr kiya aur jo (aaj) Allah ke raaste se rok rahey hain aur us masjid e haram ki ziyarat mein maney hain jisey humne sab logon ke liye banaya hai, jismein muqami bashindon aur bahar se aane walon ke huqooq barabar hain, (unki rawish yaqeenan saza ki mustahiq hai), is (masjid e haram) mein jo bhi raasti se hatkar (deviate from righteousness) zulm ka tareeqa ikhtiyar karega usey hum dardnaak azaab ka maza chakhayenge
